control_attributes.control_description: The organization: a. Loads and executes the operating environment from hardware-enforced, read-only media; andb. Loads and executes [Assignment: organization-defined applications] from hardware-enforced, read-only media.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization employs [Assignment: organization-defined security safeguards] to ensure that only [Assignment: organization-defined individuals or information systems] receive the [Assignment: organization-defined information, information system components, or devices].

Control Statement: The organization: a. Loads and executes the operating environment from hardware-enforced, read-only media; andb. Loads and executes [Assignment: organization-defined applications] from hardware-enforced, read-only media.
